DOC.brief_title: Effect Fenoterol Metered Dose Inhaler Beta-receptor Population Lymphocytes Patients With Bronchial Asthma
DOC.criteria: sex : male female age : 18 year bronchial asthma , diagnosis confirm history positive inhalation challenge test ( unspecific challenge carbachol , PD100SRaw ) ) severity asthma mild moderate asthmatic symptomfree interval Raw ≤ 5 cm H2O/l/s antiasthmatic treatment week ( steroid therapy : two week ) start study clinically significant , concomitant haematological , cardiac , renal , hepatic metabolic diseases intercurrent disease , e.g . severe respiratory infection patient without follow preparation 5week trial : inhaled/oral steroid theophylline antihistamine , antiallergic drug inhaled/oral sympathomimetics anticholinergic
